SEARCH
Package message

Class Message

java.lang.Object
message.Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
DirectMessage, Post
public class Message extends Object
represents message that can be sent from an account. also has a functionality to reply.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Aditya Grover

      public Message getRepliedTo()
